name: DOWN the DUNGEON
description:
Finally, you, the allpowerfull magician, found the crypt of the vampire who has been terrorizing the land for decades. But as you enter this tomb, it looks suspiciously empty... Will you get to the bottom of this, or will this dungeon bring your inevitable fall?

Gamedesign, programming - @alexhonor (http://tomhet.ru)

Gamedesign, programming - @MoonDweller

Art - @renrok
